entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.6°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 6.7°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
